attributes.action: Create a fast track system for refugees from the Ukraine.
attributes.additional_details: Thousands of Ukrainian's have already left the Ukraine for neighbouring countries; however, there are as many as 100 000 Ukrainian's already internally displaced. Repeatedly we are told this is the darkest time in Europe since World War II, which if this is even a fraction of the case we should attempt to learn from the terrible mistakes made during that conflict and seek to provide as much humanitarian support as possible.
attributes.background: The UK government should actively respond and allow Ukrainian refugees into the country and potentially even facilitate transport of the vulnerable, elderly and children, into the country.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
